resources.string: Ans: The timer will start upon activation. For general packages, 24 hours is considered one day. For example, if you activate a 2-day package at 16:00 on January 1, your package will expire on 16:00 on January 3.

Ans: Z-Roaming uses a virtual SIM card; as with physical SIM cards, there must be network coverage in your current region. All Z-Roaming packages are currently region-specific. Hence, you will need to check that your destination is within one of the supported regions. If you were unsuccessful in activating the service in a supported region, it is usually due to poor signal or absence of operator coverage in that region. Under such circumstances, you can try activating the service at another location.

Ans: The Z-Roaming service will disable the physical SIM card in one card slot. Hence, for single SIM mobile phones, physical SIM cards can no longer be used. For dual SIM mobile phones, the card in the other card slot can be used normally. Should you need to use the physical SIM card, you will need to close the Z-Roaming service.

Ans: No. Z-Roaming uses virtual SIM card technology, which will have absolutely no effect on the physical SIM card in your mobile phone. It will not incur any data usage and will not damage the physical SIM card.

Ans: You may do so if it is within the validity period of the order and if you have not activated your order. Upon approval, you will receive the refund in the account through which you made your payment within 7 working days. Should you fail to activate your order within its validity period and fail to request for a refund, the service will become invalid and no refund will be made. Generally, refund requests cannot be made for activated orders.
Ans: Should you encounter any problem while using our services, you can add our WeChat public number (红茶漫游) to submit your feedback on your problem.

Ans: It will be initially available in Asian countries. Subsequently, beta services will be launched in Europe and the United States, and our coverage will expand to close to 100 countries. You can find the currently supported countries and regions, as well as the respective package prices on our service list.
Ans: Currently, only data network services are supported. Voice mails and SMS services will be respectively launched at later dates.
Ans: We recommend that you make your purchase while connected to a domestic network or a Wi-Fi network overseas.

Ans: Currently, Z-Roaming supports payment through WeChat Pay and Alipay. You can make your payments through either of the above if you have a WeChat or Alipay account. More payment options will be available in the future.

Ans: After purchasing a service, you will need to activate it before it can be used. The timer will start upon activation, and no request for refund will be entertained thereafter. (Network connection not required for activation) We recommend that you activate your order after reaching your of destination.
Ans: In general, 3G network speed will be supported. However, some countries may have 2G or 4G networks, hence, actual speeds may vary between operators in different regions.
Ans: It will take around 2-4 minutes to activate this service. After a signal is detected on your phone, it may take a few minutes for you to access the network.

Ans: Hotspot sharing is supported in most countries. If hotspot sharing is not supported or is limited in number for packages specific to a country, these will be stated clearly in our package details.

The Z-Roaming service (hereinafter referred to as This Service) is jointly brought to you by ZUK Smartphone and Redtea Roaming. You will become a Z-Roaming service user if you agree to this Agreement and use the Z-Roaming service. Before becoming a Z-Roaming service user, please read this agreement carefully. Your use of This Service shall constitute your agreement to the entire content of this Agreement.

"The laws of People's Republic of China and Hong Kong SAR shall apply in enforcing, interpreting, changing, implementing and settling disputes relating to this Agreement. Disputes arising from this Agreement shall be settled through negotiations. If an agreement cannot be reached through negotiation, either party may refer the dispute to the Hong Kong International Arbitration Center."

This Service is a network access technology jointly developed by ZUK Smartphone and Redtea Mobile. It allows its users to roam globally and enjoy fast Internet connection services without changing SIM cards. This Service has the advantages of being economical and convenient. All you have to do is purchase network access services for your required region at a service outlet.
This service shall be gradually extended to other countries and regions with further business development.
You can purchase services specific to your country through the integrated function while connected to a network.

Upon successful purchase of a service, you can activate the purchased service within the specified time limit from the day of purchase. Should you fail to activate the service within the stipulated time, this service will become invalid and no refund will be made. You can activate a purchased service while your mobile phone is connected to a network. However, you will only have network connection capability within the area corresponding to the purchased service. You will also need to connect to a local roaming partner to use the service.

Service charges (based either on duration or data usage) shall apply immediately upon successful activation of a service. Charges shall be computed continuously until the available time for the purchased service is used up.
You can request for a refund on a purchased service before the service is activated and within its validity period.
This service can be purchased by paying through WeChat Pay or Alipay while connected to a network. Hence, your device must be payment-capable in order to purchase this service.

"Should damages or compromise in user experience for other network users occur due to abuse, misuse, or wastage of or unfair advantage in data usage, the operator reserves to right to control or terminate the services provided to some users, based on the principle of fair use, where necessary. Hence, users are advised against the prolonged use of tools that incur a large amount of data usage (for online media streaming, download of videos, access of cloud files, BT online) Attached: The principle of fair use ensures that all users enjoy the same quality of service when connecting to the Redtea Mobile network, and prevents abuse of the operator’s network and compromise in user experiences of other users."

You agree to allow us to collect your location information, device ID, PLMN, LAC, CELLID and other relevant current network information during your use of the software for the purpose of enhancing the security and stability of our services. Your information may be sent to regions or countries outside of where you used our services. Under such circumstances, we will take all necessary measures to ensure the legality of such transfers, and provide suitable protection for your personal data. Your information shall only be used for purposes relating to provision of services to you.

In addition to expressly accepting this terms of use and complying with relevant laws and regulations, you promise to refrain from leasing, licensing, mortgaging, translating, adjusting, changing, or modifying this service, or integrating it with other products or services; you shall not disassemble, decompile, reverse engineer or derive other products from this service, whether in whole or in part.

We may modify or update this agreement from time to time, and will inform you of the changes through prominent notices. Your continued use of this software after receipt of any such notices shall constitute your consent to the changes in the agreement.

For any reasonable claim arising from your use of this service under this Agreement, our compensation for the actual losses incurred by you shall not exceed the total value you paid to us for using this service.

Overseas roaming service is a data network access service for people on a short trip. You can purchase overseas roaming services directly and enjoy network access during your overseas trip without needing to purchase a physical SIM card or renting a portable Wi-Fi device.

A SIM card slot will be used by the roaming service for data communication. The timer will start upon activation. You will not be able to use the SIM card in the occupied slot for dialing, receiving calls, and other functions. Please select the card to be occupied.
